page.title: 08THE LAURELS
page.content: A modern purpose-built home for the {Elderly Mentally}Infirm.Most{residents have their own room,whilst a few share double rooms,where they can keep personal effects.For the less mobile there are ample facilities for them to follow more sedentary pursuits.Routine is very important e.g regular meal times also frequent toileting is necessary, as most of the people are incontinent due to their mental state. Apart from the staff there are social workers,hairdressers,therapists,e.t.c. We visited the home at 2.30 pm,to talk to the people.They were very talkative about things in the home,and about each other.They were very aggressive to each other,and one of them threatened to "beat another resident up", but they really did like the home and had lots of things to do.
